SEARCH
Package controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
controller.UserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UserController extends Controller implements UserDAO
Controller class for managing operations related to users. Implements the UserDAO interface to provide methods for user management. This class uses the singleton pattern to ensure that only one instance of the controller exists.

Example usage: 

 UserController controller = UserController.getInstance();
 boolean isLogin = controller.login("myworld", "theworld213");
See Also:
  • UserDAO
  • User
  • Admin
  • DatabaseConnector

    • register

      public boolean register(String username, String password)
      Registers a new user in the database with the provided username and password. Automatically generates a salt for password encryption.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to register
      password - the password of the user to register
      Returns:
      true if user registration was successful, false otherwise
